title: Home
hero: 100% eco-hotel with private suites in Tulum, México.

intro.title: Eco-Hotel in Tulum, México
intro.subtitle: WELCOME TO CASA COYOTE
intro.desc: Stay at Casa Coyote, an amazing experience that will free your mind & touch your soul. Very cozy rooms, 100% ECO PRIVATE SUITES, private terrace, fresh and quiet areas, located at the beach side (3 min walk).

location.title: BEST LOCATION
location.desc: Located next to Be Tulum, Casa Malca & Nomade, 5 minute walking distance from the best restaurants, beach clubs, bars & shopping area.

nature.title: EXPERIENCE NATURE
nature.desc: We offer a unique experience inside the magic energy of Tulum, ideal for couples, families, yogis & solo adventures.

ammenities.title: AMMENITIES
ammenities.desc: For the spa lovers, 'Yáan Wellness Spa' is next to us. The property has 4 suites and a complete luxury Loft. 1 minute from the taxi station & Free Wifi.

private.title: PRIVATE ROOM
private.desc: You will feel like home. The property has 4 private rooms, and a complete Luxury Loft with a complete kitchen, fridge, stove, sofa, living room and center table.

rooms.title: Our Private Rooms
rooms.subtitle: MEET OUR ECO-SUITES
desc: All Rooms have King Size Bed, Fan, Private Bathroom, Mayan Venting, Full Closet, Hand Soap, Body Wash, Organic Shampoo.
Bath and Beach Towels. Remember that we are here for you at any time & also located at beach side (3 min walk to the beach) at the hotel area, next to Be Tulum, Casa Malca & Nomade.
5 minutes from the best restaurants, bars & shops area. Next to us we have the best Spa at Tulum Yáan.

experience.title: Casa Coyote Experience
experience.subtitle: EXPERIENCE TULUM
desc: Sunset experience is an unique opportunity to enjoy the sunset hour in a private terrace. A romantic experience to make a toast, to thanks love and life.

restaurant.title: Loco Tulum
restaurant.subtitle: MEET OUR RESTAURANT
restaurant.desc: Loco Tulum is the idea and philosophy of emphasizing the delight of every flavor, aroma, color and above all, the true taste of each offering. In turn, it tests the senses, and creates a moment of true enjoyment of life.

banner.title: Loco Concierge helps you to create the best personalized experience in Tulum.
banner.subtitle: MAGIC TOURS AND EXPERIENCES ARE WAITING FOR YOU
